00034 #include "btkCartesianCoordinates.h"
00035 
00036 
00037 namespace btk
00038 {
00039 
00040 CartesianCoordinates::CartesianCoordinates()
00041 {
00042     m_x = 0;
00043     m_y = 0;
00044     m_z = 0;
00045 }
00046 
00047 CartesianCoordinates::CartesianCoordinates(Real x, Real y, Real z)
00048 {
00049     m_x = x;
00050     m_y = y;
00051     m_z = z;
00052 }
00053 
00054 Real CartesianCoordinates::x() const
00055 {
00056     return m_x;
00057 }
00058 
00059 Real CartesianCoordinates::y() const
00060 {
00061     return m_y;
00062 }
00063 
00064 Real CartesianCoordinates::z() const
00065 {
00066     return m_z;
00067 }
00068 
00069 SphericalCoordinates CartesianCoordinates::toSphericalCoordinates()
00070 {
00071     Real rau   = std::sqrt(m_x*m_x + m_y*m_y + m_z*m_z);
00072     Real theta, phi;
00073 
00074     if(m_x == 0 && m_y == 0)    // on z-axis
00075     {
00076         theta = 0;
00077         phi = 0;
00078     }
00079     else
00080     {
00081         theta = std::acos(m_z / rau);
00082         phi   = std::acos(m_x / std::sqrt(m_x*m_x + m_y*m_y));
00083 
00084         if(m_y < 0)
00085             phi = 2.0 * M_PI - phi;
00086     }
00087 
00088     return SphericalCoordinates(theta, phi, rau);
00089 }
00090 
00091 CartesianCoordinates CartesianCoordinates::operator*(Real factor)
00092 {
00093     return CartesianCoordinates(m_x*factor, m_y*factor, m_z*factor);
00094 }
00095 
00096 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const CartesianCoordinates& c)
00097 {
00098     return os << "(" << c.m_x << ", " << c.m_y << ", " << c.m_z << ")";
00099 }
00100 
00101 } // namespace btk
